articles.title: Biden offers message for Kim Jong Un as he wraps first leg of his Asia trip - CNN
articles.description: Before President Joe Biden concluded a visit to South Korea on Sunday, he offered a brief message to the nuclear-armed dictator to the north, who US officials believe could be preparing for a provocation during the US leader's visit to Asia.

articles.author: Sid Ventura
articles.title: Gilas Pilipinas' 31-year dominance ends as Indonesia claim Southeast Asian Games gold - ESPN India
articles.description: Gilas Pilipinas have failed to win the SEA Games men's basketball gold medal for the first time since 1989 after losing to Indonesia on Sunday.
articles.content:
Indonesia pulled off the shocker of the 31st Southeast Asian Games, upsetting highly favored Gilas Pilipinas 85-81, to end the Philippines' 31-year domination of men's 5x5 basketball.
It was the fir… [+530 chars]
